title: What Is the First House in Astrology?

steps.title: The First House governs your identity and how you deal with life.
steps.content: The First House governs your identity and how you deal with life. Think of the First House as being responsible for your first impressions of life. Keep in mind that it continues to rule over how you grow and see yourself. It's hard to overstate how important the First House is in understanding your unique personality. [1] X Research source The First House on your chart can also reveal a lot about your childhood. For instance, since Neptune is known for ruling imagination, you might have been an imaginative dreamer as a child.

steps.title: The First House is the sign that rules your ego and sense of self.
steps.content: The First House is the sign that rules your ego and sense of self. Since it's the first house on your chart , it's also known as the ascendant sign. It reveals a lot about how think about yourself . For instance, if you have Sagittarius in your house, you'll probably see lots of opportunities in life, so you see yourself as an adventurer or optimist. [2] X Research source If you're not sure how to find the First House, look at the segment that's at the 9 o'clock position of your natal chart . Everyone has a sign that makes up their First House. You may even have a planet in yours, too. However, there's not a planet for every house, so don't worry if you don't have one.

steps.title: Aries and the planet Mars rule the First House.
steps.content: Aries and the planet Mars rule the First House. Aries lends an impulse tendency along with leadership qualities. It also means that you're self-motivated, especially since Mars can strengthen your sense of initiative. [3] X Research source Keep in mind that although Aries is the natural ruler of the First House, you may have other signs in your natal chart’s First House. Check out our interpretations below to learn more about what this means for you. The First House is considered a fire sign since Aries is a fire sign.

steps.title: Aries in the First House:
steps.content: Aries in the First House: You're always on the go and ready to take on life's challenges. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. It's easy to go from project to project, but this can make you seem impulsive if you can't follow through. Fortunately, with a little organization and support, there's no stopping you! [5] X Research source Since Aries naturally rules the First House, if your natal chart has Aries in the First House, it's even stronger. You'll notice these Aries traits are amplified in your life.

steps.title: Taurus in the First House:
steps.content: Taurus in the First House: You are known for your helpful nature and you're thorough in all that you do. You often come across to others as being strong and stable. Although you're always looking for practical explanations in life, you may need to be more flexible when it comes to relationships. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Gemini in the First House:
steps.content: Gemini in the First House: You have a free, independent spirit and you're known for your intellect. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. People probably say that you've got a fantastic memory, but they might also say that you're tough to figure out. Having the twins in your First House means that you're a complicated person that can show many sides to others.

steps.title: Cancer in the First House:
steps.content: Cancer in the First House: You let your confidence and social nature shine. In fact, it's easy for you to make friends and your individuality inspires them to be creative. You're also good at protecting your emotions although you do like having the support of others.

steps.title: Leo in the First House:
steps.content: Leo in the First House: You're drawn to people who admire you and you have a fun personality. You do tend to worry about what other people think about you, but you shouldn't stress—you're kind and people genuinely love your company.

steps.title: Virgo in the First House:
steps.content: Virgo in the First House: You tend to be practical and you like things done in a particular way. While your meticulous nature can make you successful, you can stress yourself out by trying to make everything perfect. If you can loosen up a little, you'll feel much more relaxed.

steps.title: Libra in the First House:
steps.content: Libra in the First House: You look to your relationships to learn about yourself. Specifically, you're diplomatic and you try to achieve balance with your interactions. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Although it's fine to care about what other people think about you, don't be overly anxious for approval .

steps.title: Scorpio in the First House:
steps.content: Scorpio in the First House: You approach life with a bold attitude and you're known for your strong will. People can't help but be impressed with your passionate and mysterious personality, but don't be afraid to show your vulnerable side every now and again.

steps.title: Sagittarius in the First House:
steps.content: Sagittarius in the First House: You're full of positive energy and it's easy for you to be charming and direct. Just try to be careful so that you don't accidentally hurt others with an insensitive comment. With Sagittarius in your First House, lean into your philosophical thinking since it's one of your defining characteristics.

steps.title: Capricorn in the First House:
steps.content: Capricorn in the First House: You never run out of ambition and you're known for your confidence. It's no surprise that some might see you as a leader, especially since it's easy for you to persevere with your goals. You might need to work on compromising since you may come across as inflexible.

steps.title: Aquarius in the First House:
steps.content: Aquarius in the First House: You prefer to focus on creative expression, so others definitely see you as completely original. Your Aquarian influence means that you try to look at life differently, so you might struggle with authority at times. Celebrate your open mindset and imagination.

steps.title: Pisces in the First House:
steps.content: Pisces in the First House: You fascinate others with your deeply spiritual sense of self. You're a classic daydreamer and you might sometimes feel that your sensitive nature gets hurt easily. You might benefit from a little organization or encouragement from others.
